title: Testcase: Empty Bounds
description: In this lab, the code showcases how traits can be used as bounds, even if the traits do not include any functionality, by using the Eq and Copy traits as examples.

meta.title: Exploring Rust Traits as Bounds
meta.description: Learn how to use Rust traits as bounds, even if the traits do not include any functionality, through the Eq and Copy trait examples.
